net.openhft.chronicle.core.jlbh

Class JLBHOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.core.jlbh.JLBHOptions

  • public class JLBHOptions
extends Object
    Data structure to store the options to pass into the JLBH constructor

    • Method Detail

      • throughput

        public JLBHOptions throughput(int throughput)
        Number of iterations per second to be pushed through the benchmark
        Parameters:
        throughput - defaults to 10,000
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • accountForCoordinatedOmmission

        public JLBHOptions accountForCoordinatedOmmission(boolean accountForCoordinatedOmmission)
        Determines whether the start time is the time the event was supposed to have happened (i.e. accounting for co-ordinated ommission) or whether the the start time is just the a factor of the throughput (i.e. not accounting for co-ordinated ommission).
        Parameters:
        accountForCoordinatedOmmission - defaults to true
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • recordJitterGreaterThanNs

        public JLBHOptions recordJitterGreaterThanNs(int recordJitterGreaterThanNs)
        Determines how much jitter to record.
        Parameters:
        recordJitterGreaterThanNs - Defaults to 1000
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • recordOSJitter

        public JLBHOptions recordOSJitter(boolean recordOSJitter)
        Determines whether or not to record jitter
        Parameters:
        recordOSJitter - Defaults to true
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • warmUpIterations

        public JLBHOptions warmUpIterations(int warmUp)
        Determines how many warmup iterations to perform. Note: warmup iterations are continuous.
        Parameters:
        warmUp - Defaults to 10,000
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • runs

        public JLBHOptions runs(int runs)
        Number of runs of the benchmark
        Parameters:
        runs - Defaults to 3
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • iterations

        public JLBHOptions iterations(int iterations)
        Number of iterations of the benchmark not including warmup.
        Parameters:
        iterations - Defaults to 100,000
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • jlbhTask

        public JLBHOptions jlbhTask(JLBHTask JLBHTask)
        The latency benchmark to be run.
        Parameters:
        JLBHTask -
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • pauseAfterWarmupMS

        public JLBHOptions pauseAfterWarmupMS(int pauseMS)
        Option to set a pause after the warmup is complete
        Parameters:
        pauseMS - pause in ms default to 0
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • skipFirstRun

        public JLBHOptions skipFirstRun(boolean skip)
        Option to skip first run from being included in the variation statistics.
        Parameters:
        skip - defult to true if runs greater than 3
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.

      • jitterAffinity

        public JLBHOptions jitterAffinity(boolean jitterAffinity)
        Should the jitter thread set affinity or not
        Parameters:
        jitterAffinity - default is false
        Returns:
        Instance of the JLBHOptions to be used in the builder pattern.
